title: league not responding causing you to dodge
body: The League of Legends client keeps (not responding) which forces me to quit out of league and start up the client (legacy) don't like the new one and so when i "dodge"i get a 5 to 30 min ban and i lose lp{{item:3073}} . Does anyone know how to stop the legacy client from not responding in ranked solo/flex, the not responding happens when i and my friends try and change skins or type to each other in private chat

replies.body:
For starters, I'd highly recommend switching to the new client, as the Legacy client will no longer be supported. With that being said, give the solutions in the Bug Splat and Game Crashes article a shot, and let me know if you see any improvements afterwards.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes
